channel.title: Atari on Garcia's Guide to the Galaxy
channel.description: Recent content in Atari on Garcia's Guide to the Galaxy

item.title: I Finally Got an ST Again
item.description: It’s been a whole number of years since I owned an Atari ST. Well over 20. In my youth I (and by “I” I mean “my family”) had two, both of which packed in after some time, the last kicking the bucket in the mid to late 90s. Ever since then I’ve longed to have another, even as I moved briefly to the Amiga before joining the PC train in 1999.
